name: Cronos Cafe
text:
Salads
Greek Salad: $11.95

Romaine lettuce, tomato, red onion, cucumber, Kalamata olives, goat Feta, house dressing.

Greek Pasta Salad: $12.50

Rotini pasta, tomato, red onion, cucumber, Kalamata olives, goat Feta, house dressing.

Mediterranean Chickpea and Couscous: $12.95

Chickpeas, vegetable stock-infused couscous, tomato, red onion, cucumber, Kalamata olives, goat Feta, house dressing.

Rotini Pasta Salad with Pesto Vinaigrette: $12.95

Rotini pasta, tomato, red onion, Kalamata olives, house pesto dressing.

Pita Flat Breads
Pita with Tzatziki: $3.25

Pita with Hummus: $3.75

Pita with Red Pepper Spread, Marinated Tomatoes, and Onions: $6.95

Pita with House-Made Pesto and Goat Feta: $6.95

Pita with Smoked Cheddar and Bacon: $6.95

Wraps
Chicken Souvlaki: $11.95

Pork Souvlaki: $11.95

Gyro: $11.95

Falafel: $11.95

Add Hummus to Wrap: $1.50

Add Goat Feta to Wrap: $1.50

Sides
French Fries: $5.50

Smoked Cheddar Poutine: $8.95

Milkshakes
Big Milkshakes: $5.95

Flavors: Hazelnut, Blackberry, Peach, Orange, Coconut, Butterscotch, Peppermint, Strawberry, Cinnamon, Irish Cream, Vanilla, Chocolate.

Double Shot Espresso Milkshake: $6.95

Note: The full menu is not available for takeout due to staffing considerations.
